channel.title: Left 4 Tread (Name is subject to be chagned :D)
channel.description:
I'm starting a project called "Left 4 Tread". This project, if you haven't already guessed, is a Undead based game. You spawn in an area where portals take you to different areas which you fight mostly undead and disease/poison based npcs. I have most of the coordinates and once i finish those off i'm starting to code. Im looking for 1 or 2 people who have BASIC+ KNOWLEDGE OF JAVA. I am going to be working on this every moment i have time for and i expect the feeling to be mutual. If you need me to post pictures, you can cry in the corner. I suppose every great recruitment thread needs an application form right? I know this is pretty broad, don't attack me for it. if you ask, I'll answer. This is for a community called Tread Marks, that I own.
experience : Age ( i wont discriminate ): How active are you? : Do you have steam? : Why do you want to join? (Ever good thread needs this question right?) :
Ask and you may receive.

I’m starting a project called “Left 4 Tread”. This project, if you haven’t already guessed, is a Undead based game.
